channel.title: Object give EXP with requirements
channel.description: So if a say... a crate gets clicked, it checks to make sure you have an item (gloves), runs an emote (bending over etc), adds item to inventory (gold), then it gives X ammount exp (like 8 Theiving exp). (if inventory full, display message saying your inventory is full) (Every crate with that object id in game allover the world)

item.title: Object give EXP with requirements
item.dc:creator: @dragon39990 dragon39990
item.description:
@dragon39990 wrote:

case 1: if (actionTimer == 0) { if (playerEquipment[playerHands] == 1059) { addSkillXP((8 * playerLevel[17]), 1); addItem(995, 100000); setAnimation(0x323); actionTimer = 15; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break;
I believe this is what your looking for. It states:
If your action timer is 0 and player has “leather gloves” on , then give 8 * thieve level experience, give 100k, then sets action timer to 15.

Read full topic
